home.title: Text Exercises
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Text Exercise

textExercise.created: A new Text Exercise is created with identifier {{ param }}
textExercise.updated: A Text Exercise is updated with identifier {{ param }}
textExercise.deleted: A Text Exercise is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Text Exercise {{ title }}?

textExercise.exampleSubmissionsRequireExercise: To create an example submission, you first need to finish creating the text exercise.
textExercise.confirmSubmission: Are you sure you want to submit? You cannot edit your answer anymore until you get an assessment!
textExercise.submitSuccessful: Your answer was submitted successfully! Now you can't edit your answer anymore. Please wait for your feedback.
textExercise.submitDeadlineMissed: Your answer was submitted successfully! Now you can't edit your answer anymore. Please wait for your feedback. As you missed the deadline the score will not be counted.
textExercise.error: An error occured. Please try again later.
